subtitles.original: Zombies are crying
subtitles.english: Zombies are crying

subtitles.original: Oh... 冷めきった Crazy
subtitles.english: Oh... a completely chilled-out crazy

subtitles.original: 現実と言われる名の 弾丸(バレット)に撃ち抜かれた
subtitles.english: Shot through by a bullet known as reality

subtitles.original: Zombies are crying
subtitles.english: Zombies are crying

subtitles.original: Oh... 蠢いている My head
subtitles.english: Oh... squirming inside my head

subtitles.original: 何を捜し彷徨っているの
subtitles.english: What am I searching for, wandering about?

subtitles.original: 清らかな水をくれ 焼け付くこの喉に
subtitles.english: Give me pure water for this burning throat

subtitles.original: 声が枯れるほどに叫んでいるのだけど
subtitles.english: Though I'm screaming until my voice runs dry

subtitles.original: Zombies are crying
subtitles.english: Zombies are crying

subtitles.original: Oh... 慈悲なき闇で
subtitles.english: Oh... in the merciless darkness

subtitles.original: 死して生きるとはの転生
subtitles.english: The reincarnation of living after death

subtitles.original: 立ち上がれ Living dead
subtitles.english: Stand up, living dead

subtitles.original: Zombies are remember me
subtitles.english: Zombies, remember me

subtitles.original: 夢見たいよ
subtitles.english: I want to see a dream

subtitles.original: 静けさが染み込むようで 息を止めた午前5時
subtitles.english: The silence sinks in, and I hold my breath at 5 AM

subtitles.original: 非常階段で爪を噛む 明日はどっちだ The Day
subtitles.english: Biting my nails on the fire escape, which way is tomorrow, The Day?

subtitles.original:
THE DAY
作詞・作曲 新藤晴一
subtitles.english:
THE DAY
Lyrics/Composition: Haruichi Shindo

subtitles.original: 決して明けない夜も 降り続けて止まない雨も
subtitles.english: Even nights that never end, and rain that falls without stopping

subtitles.original: このろくでもない世界にはあるんだよ
subtitles.english: They exist in this good-for-nothing world

subtitles.original: 少しも変ではないの 泥濘みに足を取られてる
subtitles.english: It's not strange at all, having your feet caught in the mud

subtitles.original: あなたを責めているわけじゃないんだよ
subtitles.english: I'm not blaming you for it

subtitles.original: 独り 空想に遊ぶ
subtitles.english: Playing in fantasies alone

subtitles.original: そこで思い描いたことまで 恥じるのかい？
subtitles.english: Do you even feel ashamed of what you imagined there?

subtitles.original: 絡み合う 迷宮 迷宮 それでも行くと言うの？
subtitles.english: An entangling labyrinth, a labyrinth, yet you say you'll go?

subtitles.original: 小さき旅人が奏でる 始まりの鐘の音
subtitles.english: A tiny traveler plays the bell of beginnings

subtitles.original: 行く当ても 茫々 茫々 本当は怖いんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: No destination, just vagueness, vagueness, aren't you actually scared?

subtitles.original: 踏み出すその一歩一歩が 変えてゆく奇跡
subtitles.english: Every step you take forward is a miracle that changes things

subtitles.original: さあ 立て The Day
subtitles.english: Now, stand up, The Day

subtitles.original: 分かり合えない奴も 分かったようなふりした奴も
subtitles.english: Those you can't understand, and those who pretend to understand

subtitles.original: このろくでもない世界にはいるんだよ
subtitles.english: They are in this good-for-nothing world

subtitles.original: ここは地獄じゃなくて まして天国のはずもなく
subtitles.english: This isn't hell, and certainly isn't meant to be heaven either

subtitles.original: ちょうどその真ん中のような場所なんだ
subtitles.english: It's a place just right in the middle

subtitles.original: 遊ぼう 占いのカード
subtitles.english: Let's play with the tarot cards

subtitles.original: 風が巻き上げた意味なら 知ってるんだろう
subtitles.english: You probably know the meaning the wind blew up

subtitles.original: 絡み合う 迷宮 迷宮 それでも行くと言うの？
subtitles.english: An entangling labyrinth, a labyrinth, yet you say you'll go?

subtitles.original: 小さき旅人が奏でる 始まりの鐘の音
subtitles.english: A tiny traveler plays the bell of beginnings

subtitles.original: 行く当ても 茫々 茫々 本当は怖いんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: No destination, just vagueness, vagueness, aren't you actually scared?

subtitles.original: 踏み出すその一歩一歩が 変えてゆく奇跡
subtitles.english: Every step you take forward is a miracle that changes things

subtitles.original: さあ 立て The Day
subtitles.english: Now, stand up, The Day

subtitles.original: その目で見えたものだけ 信じていたいけれど
subtitles.english: I want to believe only in what I saw with these eyes, but...

subtitles.original: 影に怯えては
subtitles.english: If you are frightened by the shadows...

subtitles.original: 悪い予感が本当に化ける
subtitles.english: Bad premonitions will truly transform

subtitles.original: Cry more...
subtitles.english: Cry more...
